Actions¶

Actions execute commands if a Watcher successfully emits an Event (matched the filter).

Core¶

class watchm8.actions.core.Cmd(cmd, args=None, cwd=None, env=None, success_exit_code=0, raise_on_failure=True)¶

Execute shell command

Example

do:
    kind: .core.Cmd
    cmd: python
    args:
        - hello.py
    cwd: /tmp
    env:
        SAY: "Hello World."
Parameters:
  • cmd (str) – Command to execute
  • args (list, optional) – A list of args to pass to command
  • cwd (str, optional) – Working directory
  • env (dict, optional) – Dict of environment variables, eg. {“FOO”: “BAR”}
  • success_exit_code (int) – Code process must exist with to be successful, default: 0
  • raise_on_failure (bool) – Raise exception if action failed, default: True

Say¶

class watchm8.actions.say.Event(*args, **kwargs)¶

Log event to info level

Example

do:
    kind: .say.Event

Kubernetes¶

class watchm8.actions.k8s.CreateUpdateConfigMap(yaml_file, namespace='default', is_template=False, raise_on_failure=True)¶

Create or update Kubernetes ConfigMap

Example

do:
    kind: .k8s.CreateUpdateConfigMap
    yaml_file: /path/to/config_map.yaml
    namespace: default
    is_template: False
Parameters:
  • yaml_file (str) – Path to YAML resource definition
  • namespace (str) – Kubernetes namespace, default: ‘default’
  • is_template (bool) – yaml_file is template and needs to be rendered before deserialization, default: False
  • raise_on_failure (bool) – Raise exception if action failed, default: True
  • config (dict, optional) – Kubernetes API auth configuration, defaults to using ~/.kube/config
class watchm8.actions.k8s.CreateUpdateDeployment(yaml_file, namespace='default', is_template=False, raise_on_failure=True)¶

Create or update Kubernetes Deployment

Example

do:
    kind: .k8s.CreateUpdateDeployment
    yaml_file: /path/to/deployment.yaml
    namespace: default
    is_template: False
Parameters:
  • yaml_file (str) – Path to YAML resource definition
  • namespace (str) – Kubernetes namespace, default: ‘default’
  • is_template (bool) – yaml_file is template and needs to be rendered before deserialization, default: False
  • raise_on_failure (bool) – Raise exception if action failed, default: True
  • config (dict, optional) – Kubernetes API auth configuration, defaults to using ~/.kube/config

class watchm8.actions.k8s.CreateUpdateResource(yaml_file, namespace='default', is_template=False, raise_on_failure=True, config=None)¶

Base class for all create/update actions

Parameters:
  • yaml_file (str) – Path to YAML resource definition
  • namespace (str) – Kubernetes namespace, default: ‘default’
  • is_template (bool) – yaml_file is template and needs to be rendered before deserialization, default: False
  • raise_on_failure (bool) – Raise exception if action failed, default: True
  • config (dict, optional) – Kubernetes API auth configuration, defaults to using ~/.kube/config
class watchm8.actions.k8s.CreateUpdateService(yaml_file, namespace='default', is_template=False, raise_on_failure=True)¶

Create or update Kubernetes service

Example

    kind: .k8s.CreateUpdateService
    yaml_file: /path/to/service.yaml
    namespace: default
    is_template: False
Parameters:

  • namespace (str) – Kubernetes namespace, default: ‘default’
  • is_template (bool) – yaml_file is template and needs to be rendered before deserialization, default: False
  • raise_on_failure (bool) – Raise exception if action failed, default: True
  • config (dict, optional) – Kubernetes API auth configuration, defaults to using ~/.kube/config
class watchm8.actions.k8s.DeleteConfigMap(name=None, yaml_file=None, namespace='default', is_template=False, raise_on_failure=True)¶

Delete Kubernetes ConfigMap

The resource name needs to be specified directly through name or through the name attribute in yaml_file.

Example

do:
    kind: .k8s.DeleteConfigMap
    name: myresource
    namespace: default
    is_template: False
Parameters:
  • name (str, optional) – Name of Kuberntes resource
  • yaml_file (str, optional) – Path to YAML resource definition
  • namespace (str) – Kubernetes namespace, default: ‘default’
  • is_template (bool) – yaml_file is template and needs to be rendered before deserialization, default: False
  • raise_on_failure (bool) – Raise exception if action failed, default: True
  • config (dict, optional) – Kubernetes API auth configuration, defaults to using ~/.kube/config
